test_cases.name: 반도체 장비 제어 소프트웨어
test_cases.input:
이번 프로젝트는 반도체 장비 제어 소프트웨어입니다.
팀은 3명 정도이고 기간은 about 6 months 정도 생각하고 있습니다.
Must have 기능은 Motion control, TCP/IP communication 이고
Nice to have 로는 logging, monitoring UI 가 있으면 좋겠습니다.
Platform은 Windows 기반이고 Python, C# 혼용을 고려 중입니다.

test_cases.name: Automation system (모호한 입력)
test_cases.input:
We are planning a small automation system.
인원은 2~3명 정도로 flexible 하고,
기간은 1년 이내면 좋겠습니다 (maybe shorter).
요구사항은 아직 evolving 중이고
추후 scope change 가능성이 큽니다.
Budget은 tight 합니다.

test_cases.name: Decision-support agent
test_cases.input:
This is a decision-support agent development project.
Team size will be 4 people.
The expected timeline is 1 year and 3 months.
Core requirement is rule-based analysis (LLM is forbidden).
Nice features include reporting dashboard and export 기능.
Target environment is Linux (WSL) and Python only.

test_cases.name: Semiconductor equipment control + monitoring (복합·엄격 요구사항)
test_cases.input:
We are building a semiconductor equipment control SW + monitoring dashboard.
Team size: 2~4 engineers (HW interface dev + UI dev), but ideally 3.
Timeline: within 9 months (prefer 6 months). Start is next month.
Must have: Motion control, TCP/IP communication, SECS/GEM integration, recipe management, alarm handling.
Nice to have: MES interface, remote diagnostics, automated report generation, multilingual UI (Korean/English).
Constraints:
- Target OS: Windows 10/11 on factory PCs, 일부는 WSL2 기반 dev 환경.
- Language stack: Python + C# (WPF), 일부 low-level은 C++ 고려.
- LLM usage is forbidden for production runtime (security policy), but allowed for offline tooling.
- Budget is tight, scope change is likely, and requirements are still evolving.
- Must comply with internal security: no internet access on production machines.
Please propose what to clarify first and what trade-offs to consider.
